name: Welcome
text: Hi! I'm Ally :wave:. My friends and I love to share tips with you. Let's build products and services that make all of us feel included.

name: Screen reader Windows
text: Narrator is the default screen reader for Windows. Enable it by going to Start > Settings > Ease of Access  and toggle Narrator On.

name: Screen reader Mac
text: Turn on VoiceOver by pressing Command-F5 on your Mac keyboard.

:a11y-ash: Do you need the role=”navigation” on a <nav> element? Nope. You don't need both! Check out ARIA Landmarks Examples as a reference.
:a11y-alex: Don't forget to test as you build! Integrate Pa11y as part of your development build pipeline.
:a11y-andy: Did you know you can put in a Microrequest for an Accessibility Audit of your project? Submit a request today!
:a11y-ace: Want to feel more confident about running an Accessibility audit? Take the 101 Manual Training course!
